data.name: Nightmare runners
data.description:
"Nightmare Runners" immerses players in a pulse-pounding Gorilla Tag fan game that seamlessly blends horror, multiplayer mayhem, and voice chat camaraderie for an unforgettable experience. Step into a hauntingly atmospheric environment where darkness conceals both your allies and lurking adversaries. Your mission: navigate the eerie landscape, outsmart rivals, and emerge triumphant in this adrenaline-fueled race against terror.
Multiplayer action takes center stage as players join forces with friends or collaborate with strangers to sprint through the nightmarish terrain. The game's chilling graphics create an immersive horror setting, complete with ominous shadows, spine-tingling sound effects, and unexpected scares at every twist and turn. Your goal? Survive any monster you come across none of them are good and only want you DEAD!
Voice chat becomes a vital tool for survival and strategy, enhancing the immersive experience. Communicate effectively with teammates, share information about lurking threats, and coordinate movements to outsmart the horrors that await. Positional audio adds to the tension, allowing you to hear the faintest whispers of allies and the ominous echoes of approaching adversaries.
"Nightmare Runners" introduces a range of horror-inspired Collectables and traps, adding surprise and strategy to the gameplay. Players use these Collectables to get cosmetics that make your style pop out from others and make your gameplay dynamic and exhilarating. Have fun!
